default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: ...MBCC? What's that? You're not tricking me into doing something bad, are you... I can continue my inventions here? Hurray! I can use your special equipment and rare materials, right?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Thanks for the new saw blades. I've installed them around the engine to make a Chakram Mini Fan... Eh, this can actually be my new weapon...?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Look, this little flying car is my proudest work, because I can ride it to see the blue sky and white clouds, that's why I named it... the Formidable Tomato.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: What other feature should I add?

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Where did my Auto Dashing Wheel go... Eh? It's already... dashed out...?

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Did you see how scary those guys look? They must be dangerous... Huh? I've chased them off already? Oh right...

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Next time I'll bring the Electric Darting Mouse too. It would buy us more time...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Little Landmine! Ready, go!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: The battery reserve... is running out...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: What's in my bag? Uh... nothing special, really, just a couple of drills, hand saws, wrenches, pliers, and other tools... Oh yes, and a Foldable Auto Washing and Drying Machine.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: This Solar Spinning Top is a very interesting toy. You just place it on the ground, and it'll keep spinning without any manual effort... Hmm? But whipping it is the fun part of playing it? Huh, is that so...?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Alright... The disassembly of the cafeteria's tables will be done soon. The next step is to move the training room's gym equipment here for assembly. With these Gym Tables, everyone can eat and exercise at the same time, saving a lot of time and improving productivity...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Little jellyfish, what are you doing here? Didn't I tell you not to bounce around before the reinforcement is complete... Oh, Chief? This is not a weapon, just an alarm clock with bounce and chat features. In fact... Can I record your voice as its audio source? I think it'd be perfect...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I replaced the movement of your broken watch and added in it a micro communication device that no scan can detect. Wear it and make a call gesture by your ear, and you can trigger the discreet call function. I... Uh... You always go on undercover missions, I think you, you may find it useful...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: My eye-opening journeys are the inspiration for many of my inventions, such as the Poisonous Mushroom Detector, the Wildlife-proof Tent, and the Convertible Camo Station Wagon... Speaking of, well, its passenger seat is still vacant... The seat's color matches the shackles. It can massage your sore muscles and is even equipped with a small work desk. It's also the perfect size for you!

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Lightning Escape Shoes, Auto Strikeback Shield, Nightmare Catcher Helmet... All equipped! This is the self-defense gear I took a long time to develop. Now they can finally serve their purpose! I'm certain they'll give you the best protection. Also, t-thank you for accepting them.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Chief, could you try out the Emergency Ejection Chair in your office? You're gonna be fine. I've laid out some sponge mats outside.

default.title: Idle
default.text: ...Is something malfunctioning? Time to take it apart for a checkup...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Hmm? What are these mysterious patterns on the lens?! Could it be some unknown optical phenomenon? I must analyze them carefully... Their shapes are... 100% identical to your fingerprints? Ah, so that's just your fingerprints... Although I don't quite understand why you always touch my spectacles, if that tickles your fancy, go on then...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Hmm... I should take my new Tap Dancing Ice Cream Truck out for a test drive...

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Performance test of the Tap Dancing Ice Cream Truck complete. Um, the experimental data and user feedback suggest that I should replace tap dance with ballet...

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: How strange... In theory, reversing the electrodes should solve it, but there's no reaction... When did you come in? Have you been watching me doing experiments this whole time... Ah! I know! I've read about a theory that the presence of an observer can affect the experimental result. Keep staring and don't move, let me try again...

eureka_in_meowingtons.title: Level Up
eureka_in_meowingtons.text: Look at you! You are a little kitty with a big fluffy belly!

eureka_in_meowingtons.title: Obtain Attire
eureka_in_meowingtons.text: Kitten Aid Gadget set... target locked! Trapping mode activated, ready to launch operation phase 1! ...W-whoa, don't come at me all at once!

eureka_in_meowingtons.title: Greeting
eureka_in_meowingtons.text: Hmm? A red dot blipping on my kitten radar... and it's moving closer? ...Ahh! Oh... s-so it's just you, Chief!

eureka_in_meowingtons.title: Ordinary Contact 1
eureka_in_meowingtons.text: There, there, let's finish the meal first, and then I'll take you all to the vet, okay? Uh-uh, no shaking your head. You promised! You meow it, you mean itâ€”and that's my good kitty.

eureka_in_meowingtons.title: Ordinary Contact 2
eureka_in_meowingtons.text: Why does my kitten radar always pick up Chief? Hmm... Eureka! It's because Chief is actually a kitty! Yup, I knew it!

eureka_in_meowingtons.title: Idle
eureka_in_meowingtons.text: I know I can't save all the stray cats in the world... but I'll try my best to help every one I meet. I want to make them feel safe and warm in my care.

eureka_in_meowingtons.title: Annoyed
eureka_in_meowingtons.text: Guys, stop pawing at me! That tickles! Hey, no cuddles until you're bathed and dewormed, okay?

eureka_in_meowingtons.title: Special Attention
eureka_in_meowingtons.text: Once all my inventions are patented and make me rich, I will build a huge cattery for all the stray cats in DisCity, and help them find loving families.
